mapper.sql:
SELECT * FROM notice_tbl
nt_title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
nt_content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
mapper.select: select nt_number, nt_title, nt_writer, nt_content, to_char(nt_regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as nt_regdate, nt_readcnt from notice_tbl where nt_number = #{nt_number}
mapper.insert:
select notice_tbl_seq.nextval from dual
insert into notice_tbl(nt_number, nt_title, nt_writer, nt_content, nt_regdate, nt_readcnt) values( notice_tbl_seq.nextval, #{nt_title}, #{nt_writer}, #{nt_content}, sysdate, 0)
